text: Iwo amapembedza zinthu zina, osati Mulungu, zimene sizingathe kuwapweteka kapena kuwathandiza ndipo amati,“Izi zidzatilankhuliraifekwa Mulungu.” Nena,“Kodi inu mukumuuza Mulungu za zinthu zimene Iye sazidziwa zomwe zili kumwamba kapena pa dziko lapansi? Iye ndi Woyera ndipo akhale wa pamwamba kuposa mafano awo.”
